title: Email
text: This is my work email and so far it has not disappeared me. It works as it should.

title: Constant fake spam email at top of inbox…
text: Constantly has a spam “add” as a fake email at the top of the inbox, not very secure feeling. Really tired of the false email notification, it’s a spam add, everyday, I’m over it.

title: Great Service
text: Outlook has been a reliable means to communicate through email. Storage is great, service is good and easily accessible upon looking for help.

title: Worst update ever! Don’t update!!
text: All notifications on the app and to my watch has been messed up since the update. It’s a major pain

title: Floating New Mail button is bad
text: I need to rant: the blue New Mail button in Outlook mobile is such a terrible UI element. It's too easy to hit, it blocks my content, it keeps changing shapes, it’s aggravating. The most important thing I do on mobile is read mail and calendar — sending mail is less important especially on a small screen that you’ve made smaller with your floating button.

title: Always having issues
text:
I like the fact that I am able to access my business and work email from my phone , etc.

But this app has some serious issue updating syncing the emails on time.  It’s so delayed and as far as what you can do on the app as well, it’s limited.  Being the fact that it is Microsoft is disappointing to see that app from them so this is going to be a one star for me.

title: The Best App on the Market
text: I have tried them all and found this app was the best with no close second.

title: ok
text: i prefer google but in forced to use outlook for school so i might as wel

title: The best email app !!
text: Outlook stands out as the epitome of excellence in email management. Surpassing even the standard Apple Mail app, it offers unparalleled ease of navigation, efficient email flagging, marking as unread, and seamless email responses. Its intuitive user interface and streamlined user experience unequivocally establish it as the premier choice among email applications.

title: Logging out, unresponsive
text:
Constantly logging out, every time you open app you have to “add account” 
Is there a way to roll back a coupe versions to the working version??? Last update did not fix it either

title: Great app
text: Great app but would be outstanding with a few features similar to the Apple mailbox (send again being a big one). But it’s an easy app to use and works great, I’d be lost without outlook.

title: Undo function doesn’t work
text: Typing a long e-mail. Used the swipe function to auto-type a predicted word. It wiped half of my email somehow. I shook the phone and hit undo. Nothing happened. Shook it again, nothing happened

title: Reminders
text: Excellent and keeps reminding of all the messages and updates

title: Much better!!
text: I wrote a pretty scathing review several years back and this app has come a LONG way. I don’t really have any complaints now save one - stop auto populating the ‘Signature’ with your spam. Signature should be blank by default.

title: Review
text: Great safe easy email system

title: I loveit
text: I kind of love it, but it doesn’t tell me the notifications

title: When will the notification message preview be fixed?
text: 3-4 updates ago all of the sudden this app stopped showing message preview in notifications and just says open your app to view. I’ve checked ALL the settings and disabled and renabled notifications and it doesn’t work. Usually about 7-10 days it finally starts working in its own.

title: Does what it should.
text: Reliable. Easy to use.

title: Terrible app. IMAP impossible to crossover to browser
text: After being fed up with the outlook mail app bc I wasn’t able to add a new folder (I would press “add new” and then it would immediately disappear), wasn’t able to sort my mail or change the view of how I saw the full email, I tried to log into the browser on my iPad Pro. It also continued to log me out every week and input the additional IMAP advanced settings which is super annoying. I wasn’t able to log in with any IMAP on my browser, it didn’t even recognize my account that I log into regularly. It shouldn’t be this complicated. Were in 2024. Gmail has never had these issues and I wish so badly my company didn’t use outlook. Please hire some skilled people back and fix your apps. I shouldn’t have to waste so much time trying to log in and sort my emails.

title: student opinion
text:
i use outlook very often for middle school. it always notifies me whenever i’ve received an email and is very easy to use.
sometimes, it takes a while to refresh but maybe my phone is just slow. 
9.5/10 recommendation.

title: Too basic
text:
Missing many basic features: - can’t subscribe to internet calendars (kids sports games) - doesn’t intelligently offer folders to file messages like Apple does. This is important when you have hundreds of folders 

Deleting a message in a thread is mind numbing.  Most time I accidentally delete the whole thread of emails. This is a major miss - no swipe to delete individual email in a thread. You have to click the 3 little dots and hope you delete the right message in a thread. 

Not possible to move a message in a thread to a folder. How did they miss this?

Contact management is impossible. I have so many duplicates in my phone and all of them have this dumb outlook link to a webpage. They’ve ruined thousands of contacts 

Notifications don’t work. I will often get 3 popups of the same email. New email notification count on the app icon is always wrong. I’ve never once opened the app to have it match the number of new emails to the number notification on the app icon 

Can’t collapse folders when filing a message. Have to scroll through hundreds of folders to file messages away 

If my company did not force me to use this, it would not take up useless space in my phone. I have tried for 4 years to make this app work but it stinks. Fix the basics!!!

title: Okay Mail Reader
text: Gets the job done but interface is “clunky” and lacks a lot features.

title: Please improve the search function
text:
I get tons of email and I often have to search for an email on a specific topic. The search function seems to be hit or miss.

I have to often try two or three different search terms before I find the email I’m searching for. This needs to be fixed

title: I’m sorry
text: I know I’ve been grouchy and want to apologize and say I’m sorry but Breana is just using me to get by in life. Breana made me his source and Breana and Gilmore keep touching me, committing home invasion, robbery, trafficking and abusive. It took me forever to even somewhat feel decent anymore. Humanity strayed too far for too long and then lied their ways through life. I had a 401 k and it was at $38,000. They only left me $5000, and then on top of that they took/stole the $400,000 that my dad made from selling his second home. My dad died in October and guess who won’t get out of my car and home and life. For the life of them, they won’t stop the stealing and destruction of property and bodily harm. In my day they were apprehend and put away for their crimes. Thank you for helping me with my phone. The rest of my life is suffering like Jesus of Nazareth. I was really affected by their actions. They keep stealing from me of all people. It scares me for real because I don’t have a man. I’m on my own and I’m fine, it’s a learning experience for me because my PTSD has hold of me.
